response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. This exceptional item is worth an incredible $1,000,000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. Considering its immense value, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a rare opportunity to acquire such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
